metadata.title: Set ' Hidden Text' as Enabled
metadata.description: Set ' Hidden Text' as Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'Default File Format' to Enabled (Word Document (.docx))
metadata.description: Set 'Default File Format' to Enabled (Word Document (.docx))

metadata.title: Set 'Make Hidden Markup Visible' to Enabled
metadata.description: Set 'Make Hidden Markup Visible' to Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'Turn Off File Validation' to Enabled
metadata.description: Set 'Turn Off File Validation' to Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'Warn Before Printing, Saving or Sending a File That Contains Tracked Changes or Comments' to Enabled
metadata.description: Set 'Warn Before Printing, Saving or Sending a File That Contains Tracked Changes or Comments' to Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'VBA Macro Notification Settings' to Enabled (Disable all Except Digitally Signed)
metadata.description: Set 'VBA Macro Notification Settings' to Enabled (Disable all Except Digitally Signed)

metadata.title: Set 'Scan Encrypted Macros in Word Open XML Documents' to Enabled
metadata.description: Set 'Scan Encrypted Macros in Word Open XML Documents' to Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'Require That Application Add-ins Are Signed By Trusted Publisher' to Enabled
metadata.description: Set 'Require That Application Add-ins Are Signed By Trusted Publisher' to Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'Trust Access to Visual Basic Project' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Trust Access to Visual Basic Project' to Disabled

metadata.title: Set 'Disable Trust Bar Notification for Unsigned Application Add-ins and Block Them' to Enable
metadata.description: Set 'Disable Trust Bar Notification for Unsigned Application Add-ins and Block Them' to Enable

metadata.title: Set 'Default File Block Behavior' to Enabled (Blocked files are not opened)
metadata.description: Set 'Default File Block Behavior' to Enabled (Blocked files are not opened)

metadata.title: Set 'Word 6.0 Binary Documents and Templates' to Enabled (Open/Save blocked, use open policy)
metadata.description: Set 'Word 6.0 Binary Documents and Templates' to Enabled (Open/Save blocked, use open policy)

metadata.title: Set 'Word 95 Binary Documents and Templates' to Enabled (Open/Save Blocked, Use Open Policy)
metadata.description: Set 'Word 95 Binary Documents and Templates' to Enabled (Open/Save Blocked, Use Open Policy)

metadata.description: Set 'Word 97 Binary Documents and Templates' to Enabled (Open/Save Blocked, Use Open Policy)

metadata.title: Set 'Word 2 and Earlier Binary Documents and Templates' to Enabled (Open/Save blocked, use open policy)
metadata.description: Set 'Word 2 and Earlier Binary Documents and Templates' to Enabled (Open/Save blocked, use open policy)

metadata.title: Set 'Turn Off Protected View for Attachments Opened From Outlook' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Turn Off Protected View for Attachments Opened From Outlook' to Disabled

metadata.title: Set 'Document Behavior if File Validation Fails' to Enabled (Open in Protected View) Unchecked for "Do not allow edit"
metadata.description: Set 'Document Behavior if File Validation Fails' to Enabled (Open in Protected View) Unchecked for "Do not allow edit"

metadata.title: Set 'Do Not Open Files in Unsafe Locations in Protected View' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Do Not Open Files in Unsafe Locations in Protected View' to Disabled

metadata.title: Set 'Do Not Open Files From The Internet Zone in Protected View' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Do Not Open Files From The Internet Zone in Protected View' to Disabled

metadata.title: Set 'Allow Trusted Locations on the Network' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Allow Trusted Locations on the Network' to Disabled

metadata.title: Set 'Disable All Trusted Locations' to Enabled
metadata.description: Set 'Disable All Trusted Locations' to Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'Update Automatic Links at Open' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Update Automatic Links at Open' to Disabled

metadata.title: Set 'Custom Markup Warning' to Enabled
metadata.description: Set 'Custom Markup Warning' to Enabled

metadata.title: Set 'Use Online Translation Dictionaries' to Disabled
metadata.description: Set 'Use Online Translation Dictionaries' to Disabled
